name: Stained Glass of Light & Dark
text:
Apply these effects, in sequence, based on the Types of Effect Monsters you control.
Fairy: Draw 3 cards, then place 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of the Deck in any order.
Fiend: Your opponent draws 1 card, then they discard 1 random card, then, if they have any other cards in their hand, discard 1 more card of their choice.
You can only activate 1 "Stained Glass of Light and Dark" per turn.
